title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.2 - Authority of the director of classification and compensation to initiate geographic area pay differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.2 - Authority of the director of classification and compensation to initiate geographic area pay differentials

State Regulations

The Director of Classification and Compensation may, on his
own initiative, subject to the approval of the Director of the Budget, authorize a geographic area pay differential for any occupation in one or more
areas of the State in accordance with the provisions of subdivision 7 of
section
130
of the

Civil Service Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
142.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
